text: ðŸš¨ Update from eastern Ukraine ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¦: Russian troops are making gains in the region, including the town of Avdiivka and nearby villages. Ukraine's commander-in-chief, Oleksandr Syrskyi, confirmed the advances, but emphasized that Ukrainian forces are still fighting intensely in the area. Russia has an advantage in firepower and personnel, but Ukraine is determined to defend its territory. The situation remains complex and fluid.
